flavor: "The Lord watches over my path. I am armored in faith."
name: Sister Mary
text:
During setup, add 2 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.
[reaction] When the round ends: Add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If you succeed, add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag.
back_flavor: The more Sister Mary learns of the strange and arcane forces that sometimes manifest in this world, the more certain she is that she has been set upon a path to ward off these forces and protect the innocent wherever possible. Armed only with the trappings of her church and an unshakeable faith, Sister Mary seeks out every supernatural threat she hears of through her fellow priests and nuns. Other members of her church may dismiss such things as medieval nonsense, but Sister Mary knows the real evils that exist in the shadows - and she knows that if such evils are left untouched, they will bring ruin and horror to all of creation.
back_text: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Guardian Angel, Crisis of Faith, 1 random basic weakness.

name: Amanda Sharpe
text: Forced - At the start of the investigation phase: Draw 1 card. Discard the card beneath Amanda Sharpe. Choose a card from your hand and place it beneath her. [reaction] At the start of a skill test you are performing: Commit the card beneath Amanda Sharpe, if able. Do not discard it when the test ends. [elder_sign] effect: +0. For this test, you may double the number of skill icons on the card beneath Amanda Sharpe.
back_flavor: Amanda Sharpe was on track to become one of Miskatonic University's most accomplished graduates. However, ever since she saw a strange painting on an enormous creature's emergence from the depths of the ocean, her classwork has suffered. Her dreams are overwhelmed by images of a vast submerged city and whispers in a language she does not understand. She remains dedicated to her studies, but her goal is no longer to graduate at the top of her class; rather, she seeks to discover the meaning behind the occult secrets concealed between the lines of reality.
back_text: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, [[Practiced]] skills level 0-3. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Obscure Studies, Whispers from the Deep, 1 random basic weakness.

name: Guardian Angel
text:
Sister Mary deck only.
Guardian Angel may be assigned damage dealt to other investigators at your location and connecting locations.
[reaction] When any amount of damage is assigned to Guardian Angel: Add that many [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.

name: Crisis of Faith
text: Revelation - For each [bless] token in the chaos bag, you must either replace it with a [curse] token or take 1 horror.

name: Obscure Studies
text:
Amanda Sharpe deck only.
Fast. Play when you initiate a skill test.
Return the card beneath Amanda Sharpe to your hand and place Obscure Studies beneath her.

name: Whispers from the Deep
text: This skill's icons subtract from your skill value instead of adding to it. Forced - When choosing a card to place beneath Amanda Sharpe, if Whispers from the Deep is in your hand: You must choose it.

name: Blessed Blade
text: [action] If Blessed Blade is ready: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If a [bless] or [elder_sign] token is revealed during this attack, this attack deals +1 damage. Before revealing chaos token(s) for this attack, you may exhaust Blessed Blade to add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag.

name: Rite of Sanctification
text:
Seal (up to 5 [bless]). If Rite of Sanctification has no tokens sealed on it, discard it.
[reaction] When an investigator at your location plays a card, exhaust Rite of Sanctification and release a chaos token sealed on it: Reduce the cost of that card by 2.

name: Cryptic Grimoire
text:
[action]: Add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag.
[action] If there are 10 [curse] tokens in the chaos bag, discard Cryptic Grimoire: Record in your Campaign Log that "you have translated the grimoire." Replace 5 [curse] tokens in the chaos bag with 5 [bless] tokens.

name: Obfuscation
text:
Fast. Uses (3 charges).
[reaction] When an enemy makes an attack of opportunity against you, spend 1 charge: Cancel that attack.

name: Faustian Bargain
text:
As an additional cost to play Faustian Bargain, add 2 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag.
Investigators at your location gain a total of 5 resources, distributed as you wish.

name: Sword Cane
text: Playing Sword Cane does not provoke attacks of opportunity. [reaction] After Sword Cane enters play: Immediately trigger its "[action]" ability without paying its cost. [action] Exhaust Sword Cane: Fight/Evade. You may use your [willpower] in place of your [combat] or [agility] for this attack or evasion attempt.

name: Tides of Fate
text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window, or at the start of the round.
Replace all [curse] tokens in the chaos bag with an equal number of [bless] tokens. At the end of the round, replace all [bless] tokens in the chaos bag with an equal number of [curse] tokens.

name: Ward of Radiance
text:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws a non-weakness treachery card.
Reveal 5 random chaos tokens from the chaos bag
If a [bless] or [elder_sign] token is revealed, cancel that treachery card's revelation effect.

name: Promise of Power
text: After you commit Promise of Power to a skill test, add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag. If you cannot, take 2 horror instead.

name: Token of Faith
text: [reaction] After a skill test ends in which 1 or more [curse] or [auto_fail] tokens were revealed, exhaust Token of Faith: Add that many [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.

name: Predestined
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
You may commit Predestined to any type of test.
If this test fails, either add 2 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag or remove 2 [curse] tokens from the chaos bag.

flavor:
We all have wings, but they have not been of any avail to us and if we could tear them off, we would do so.
- Franz Kafka, "The Blue Octavo Notebooks"
name: Dread Curse
text: Revelation - Add 5 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag.
